Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • Geom.Square
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Geom_element

    public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
implements Geom_element
    This class represents a Square-4 points of 3D point in space.
    Author:
    Bar Genish, Elyashiv Deri
